api_list.api_description: Search for advice slips containing the given query term.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query for advice slips.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Define your own callback function name for JSONP.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve a specified number of quotes from Breaking Bad.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of quotes to retrieve.

query: I'm looking for advice related to 'courage' and could you also share as many quotes as I have family members from Breaking Bad?
